name.ja: <ruby>ＳＲ<rt>スピードロイド</rt></ruby>／<ruby>ＣＷＷ<rt>クリアウィングワンダー</rt></ruby>

text.en: Target cards your opponent controls up to the number of different Monster Types among the WIND Synchro Monsters you control; destroy them. If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 WIND Synchro Monster you control; banish it, then return it to the field. You can only use this effect of "Speedroid Clear Wing Wander" once per turn.
